page.title: 09RECREATION
page.content: Information from pupils of Thornham school and there parerts. {DADS FAVOURITE HOBBIES. } The most popular hobby is Fishing. Four dads like that hobby.The second favourite is little collecting. Three dads like that hobby. {MUMS FAVOURITE HOBBIES. The favourite hobby for mums is knitting.2 Mums like that. other hobbies that mums like too are cooking and flower aranging. {GIRLS FAVOURITE HOBBIES.} The girls favourite hobby is Horse riding 5 girls like that hobby and another few girls hobbies are skipping running and ballet { {BOYS FAVOURITE HOBBIES The boys favourite hobby is undoultedly football 11 boys like that and the next favourite hobby is cricket 3 boys like that.
